pages.text: This module exchanges $(#f00)redstone signals/$ with other Redstone Modules on connected tubes, effectively using the tube as a redstone conduit.$(p)Up to 16 independent channels can be selected via the module GUI, or by right-clicking the module with any $(item)Dye/$.$(p)Right-click the module with a $(item)wrench/$ to toggle it between input and output mode.

When you apply an $(l:tubes/module_expansion_card)Module Expansion Card/$ to the module, extra signal processing will be available. When the module is in $(thing)output mode/$, you can right-click the module to open a GUI and choose a mode to apply to the output signal, e.g. invert the signal, AND/OR/XOR it with another channel...$(p)The effect of each mode is described in detail in the module GUI.
